SEARCH
Package gutek.entities.decks

Class DeckBaseStatistics

java.lang.Object
gutek.entities.decks.DeckBaseStatistics
@Entity public class DeckBaseStatistics extends Object
Represents statistical data related to the usage and performance of a deck in a spaced repetition system. This class stores information about the number of new cards reviewed per day, various types of revisions, and the deck associated with these statistics. The arrays track the number of revisions over a set period of time.

    • revisionCounts

      private Map<Integer,RevisionCounts> revisionCounts
      A map that stores the revision counts for different revision strategies associated with this deck's statistics.

      Each entry in the map corresponds to a specific revision strategy, identified by its index (key in the map), and holds the associated RevisionCounts object.
